Reviews: I was charged $249 for changing spark plugs, $599 for changing only the timing belt - no tension pullies or any extras.  $98 to change the transmission fluid.

I just purchaed my second CR-V from Brew Honda and when it comes time for a third I will buy it there as well.  Friendly folks, fair pricing, great service after the sale.  All that and a free car wash every time I bring my CR-V in for service.  Will definitely purchase there again and highly recommend to others.
